properties.name: S3Bucket
properties.description: The Amazon S3 bucket of the layer archive.

type.description: The Amazon S3 bucket of the layer archive.

properties.name: S3Key
properties.description: The Amazon S3 key of the layer archive.

type.description: The Amazon S3 key of the layer archive.

properties.name: S3ObjectVersion
properties.description: For versioned objects, the version of the layer archive object to use.

type.description: For versioned objects, the version of the layer archive object to use.

properties.name: CompatibleArchitectures
properties.description: A list of compatible instruction set architectures.

type.description: A list of compatible instruction set architectures.

properties.name: CompatibleRuntimes
properties.description: A list of compatible function runtimes. Used for filtering with ListLayers and ListLayerVersions.

type.description: A list of compatible function runtimes. Used for filtering with ListLayers and ListLayerVersions.

properties.name: LayerName
properties.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.

type.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the layer.
